entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Dawson Creek
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:37 PM MST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -13.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Dawson Creek Airport 10:46 PM MST Saturday 14 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -13.4°C
Pressure: 100.5 kPa
Visibility: 2.8 km
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -15.0°C
Wind: W 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing rain. Fog patches becoming fog near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Fog becoming fog patches early in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 14 January 2023
